data.title: Pentair - M&A Summary and Business Overview
data.meta_description:
Pentair has acquired 17 companies, including 6 in the last 5 years. A total of 7 acquisitions came from private equity firms. It has also divested 5 assets.
                Pentair’s largest acquisition to date was in 2012, when it acquired Tyco Flow Control for $4.9B. It’s largest disclosed sale occurred in 2016, when it
                        sold Pentair - Valves & Controls Business to Emerson Electric for $3.2B. Pentair has acquired in 9 different US states, and 5 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include manufacturing (30%) and  machinery (18%).
data.text:
Pentair M&A Summary

Pentair has acquired 17 companies, including 6 in the last 5 years. A total of 7 acquisitions came from private equity firms. It has also divested 5 assets.

Pentair’s largest acquisition to date was in 2012, when it acquired Tyco Flow Control for $4.9B. It’s largest disclosed sale occurred in 2016, when it sold Pentair - Valves & Controls Business to Emerson Electric for $3.2B. Pentair has acquired in 9 different US states, and 5 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include manufacturing (30%) and machinery (18%).

Pentair Business Overview
